column4: Hi.  How do I report an ubuntu bug now?   Clicking on "report a bug" on launchpad keeps sending me to a "Bug reporting etiquette" page on ubuntu.com
ubuntu-bug package_name; or read the bug reporting page to see other options
Yeah.  This is an upgrading bug, tho.  So what package would that be?
ubuntu-bug update-manager; I would guess, it can be reassigned later
